p: Authorship of this and subsequent manuscripts stemming from this protocol will follow the ICMJE recommendations, and CONSORT statement where appropriate, and there is no intent to use professional writers. There are no plans to make the dataset publically available. Beyond the study team and regulatory oversight, the full protocol is only made available at the discretion of the chief investigator. The data and samples collected are expected to form multiple publications, and these publications must acknowledge this trial and study team as appropriate.
